snippet.title: Crimson Company - Kickstarter Trailer - Wildwood Tales + Digital (PC / mobile)
snippet.description:
The duelling card game revolution is live on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1918306304/crimson-company-mobile-app-3rd-expansion-core-game

Crimson Company is an intense 20-minute duel about drafting an army of sellswords. It involves deep strategic as well as tactical decisions, crazy combos and gut-wrenching mind games.

Find out more: https://www.crimsoncompany.cc/
